display.title: Is it a Phantom? Is it an Elytra?
description: Now that you have Steel, you can make a Hang Glider. This might be a good item to grab before you hit up the &&cNether&&r.
If you don't have enough Leather yet, make a &&9Butchering Knife&&r and employ its inherent Looting III to hunt some cows.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o The Hang Glider originally came from a mod known as OpenBlocks. As its utility was too great to be left on earlier versions, it was ported all the way up to modern versions.

subtitle.text: No, it's Steve with a glider!
